attributes.action: free the UK military on operations and postings outside the UK from paying income tax during their overseas duty.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Soldiers, sailors and airmen are not using most of the facilities that this income pax pays for.  In addition, if the Goverment chooses not to honour the servicemen's convenant of service to the country with fair pay, then this is one way of increasing pay to an indivdual; they are getting paid far less than the miniumum wage.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
